```{r results='hide', message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(devtools)

installifnot = 
  function(infun) 
    function(pkg, ...) 
      if (!require(tail(strsplit(pkg, split = "/")[[1]], 2)[[1]], character.only = TRUE))
        infun(pkg, ...)

ip = installifnot(utils::install.packages)
install_github = installifnot(devtools::install_github)

testing.packages = 
  list(
    testthat = ip("testthat"),
    quickcheck = install_github("RevolutionAnalytics/quickcheck/pkg"), 
    assertthat = ip("assertthat", type = "source"),
    covr = ip("covr"))

profiling.packages = 
  list(
    microbenchmark = ip("microbenchmark"))

```


```{r results='asis', echo=FALSE}
library(xtable)

make.table = 
  function(viewname, packages) {
    packages = sort(names(packages))
    table = 
      cbind(
        Title  = sapply(packages, function(x) packageDescription(x)$Title),
        Description = sapply(packages, function(x) packageDescription(x)$Description))
    row.names(table) = 
      sapply(
        packages, 
        function(x) {
          url = packageDescription(x)$URL
          if(is.null(url)) x
          else paste0("<a href=\"", url, "\">", x, "</a>")})
    print(
      xtable(
        label = "viewname",
        table),
      type = "html",
      sanitize.text.function = force)}
```
## Testing
```{r results='asis', echo=FALSE}

make.table("testing", testing.packages)
```
## Profiling
```{r results='asis', echo=FALSE}

make.table("profiling", profiling.packages)
```
